sponsor: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer
briefTitle: Study Evaluating 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine in Healthy Infants in Brazil
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Active-Controlled, Double-Blind Trial Evaluating the Safety, Tolerability, and Immunogenicity of a 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine in Healthy Infants Given With Routine Pediatric Vaccinations in Brazil
summary: The purpose of this study will be to analyze 13-valent pneumococcal vaccine given to healthy infants in Brazil for safety and tolerability, and to determine the immune response to the vaccines.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving Serotype Specific IgG Antibody Concentration â‰¥0.35 Micrograms Per Milliliter (Mcg/mL) in the 13vPnC Group Relative to 7vPnC Group 1 Month After the Infant Series
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 1 Month after the infant series (7 Months of age)
